channel.title: Quick question
channel.description:
How the hell do people train combat!
As some may know, I'm on a break from RS at the moment, but it's something I've never really understood (and if I start playing again it's what I'd want to train)... The combat stats are some of the most common 99's, yet most people that tell me how they did it say they got like 50-100k xp/hr, and I can't stand that XD
Are there any faster ways? I know about bandits, SW, PC, etc, but I still respect opinions on them (just dont feel obliged to explain them)

item.title: Quick question
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Well combat really isn’t that fast when training it via slayer, but it seems to go by fast (at least it did for me). I was getting 60k-80k cbat exp/hour, and going from 72-85 slayer gets you quite a bit of levels, even though it took nolifing for about a month. With slayer, just think of it like this. You get roughly 10% of the creature’s health as slayer experience. And as you may know, you divide the amount of health by 2.5 (7.5 for constitution) to figure out combat experience. So if you want to get 1,000,000 (roughly level 1-73) slayer experience, you have to deal roughly 10,000,000 hitpoints, which will give you about 4,000,000 combat experience (which is roughly level 1-87), and 1,333,333.33 constitution experience (roughly level 1-76, give or take).

That’s how I look at it, anyway. I have level 90 attack, 91 strength, 91 or 92 constitution (can’t remember atm), 90 defense, and like I said before, 85 slayer. I think to myself, what can I get by getting 93 slayer? Well 85-93 requires roughly 3,937,035 experience. Converting this to combat experience gives me about 5,249,380 constitution experience, and 15,748,140 combat experience. First of all, I would have between 97 and 98 constitution. If I do melee only for combat, I’m receiving enough experience for 99 attack, 99 strength, and between 91 and 92 defense.

Worst part of slayer is how long it takes, but there are many more benefits than just the experience. For example, I have 79 summoning, and from my experience, 85-93 slayer would provide enough charms for about 79-90 summoning (give or take). The monetary benefits of slayer also would give me enough money for those summoning levels, and probably enough for getting my level 80 prayer up to close to 90. My favorite part of slayer, though, is the constant change of venue I get (no need to stick in one place training forever!)

That’s just 85-93, of course. Going for 99 slayer pretty much guarantees maxing your character out.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick question
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

lol , you dont train combat in f2p anyways

anyways , I usually train at dagannoths under the lighttower.
They drop effigies , lvl 2 clues , torstol seeds ( or the other ones , idk , the seed they drop is 200 - 300k tho )
Just walk in there with rune plates or whatever , they rarely hit.
put up auto retaliate and grab your PSP , play some shit , observe the drops n shit

(Yes , that is how I ‘train’ on rs)

Read full topic

item.title: Quick question
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

m.dog311:

I’m at 90/92/90 and I’m only getting ~35kxp/hr botting. I would love to know how people get better than that (I’m f2p training at the spiders on the 3rd level of the SoS, which from what I’ve herd are the best for f2p).

In summer I got 30k xp/h, but ever since school started i’ve been getting 60k xp/h at Yaks. But they’re p2p.

Read full topic

Kill chickens.I’m serious,only 1,000,000 to get 99.
If that’s too hard for you, then kill abyssal demons or mostly anything related to slayer.

item.title: Quick question
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

Well, with guthans yes you’d have to leave to repair it, but it will last allnight, most likely from 100%, always use a ring of life, they dont hit high, so if your guthans goes to 0, get to 10gp and tele out, and your safe.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick question
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Motokid126, post:7, topic:415863”]Imm 99 str and def… 92 attack. 75-99 str was done last summer, and 80-99 def was done this summer really. I have done all my combat pretty much at bandits.

But why? Simple, bunyip, or guthans. Turn auto on, take a zammy arrow, (God item makes them attack you 24/7) Stand in a tent summon your bunyip, if you using a whip, or use guthans and dont take any food, or just a few. you can take noted food/pots/pouches and take gp, sell your pots to the store and buy them back, can stay there all the way to 99 without having to bank. I like them to attack 24/7 because i can do other shit, youtube, xbox/ps3 google, whatever the fuck i want to and dont have to pay attention, if you want to, get auto typer, go to an empty clan chat and turn auto typer on, you’ll never log out… i’ve had friend leave it on over night with guthans, tis pro or it worked great for me, 77-99 str in 2-3 weeks.[/quote]Guthans would get worn out though, but I guess the full 17 hours wouldn’t be THAT bad if you had some extra (cosidering the entire set is what, 2m?) noted to buy back from the general store (if that works at least)

Read full topic

item.title: Quick question
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

Imm 99 str and def… 92 attack. 75-99 str was done last summer, and 80-99 def was done this summer really. I have done all my combat pretty much at bandits.

But why? Simple, bunyip, or guthans. Turn auto on, take a zammy arrow, (God item makes them attack you 24/7) Stand in a tent summon your bunyip, if you using a whip, or use guthans and dont take any food, or just a few. you can take noted food/pots/pouches and take gp, sell your pots to the store and buy them back, can stay there all the way to 99 without having to bank. I like them to attack 24/7 because i can do other shit, youtube, xbox/ps3 pornhub, whatever the fuck i want to and dont have to pay attention, if you want to, get auto typer, go to an empty clan chat and turn auto typer on, you’ll never log out… i’ve had friend leave it on over night with guthans, tis pro or it worked great for me, 77-99 str in 2-3 weeks.

Read full topic
